summary: This is an email from November 8, 2019, discussing an update on the timing of 'pros memos' (likely prosecution memoranda) related to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender indicates they spoke with a team and plans to roll out at least two different memos over the coming weeks.

events.title: Team Discussion on Epstein Prosecution Memos
events.description: The sender spoke with a team regarding an update on the timing of prosecution memoranda related to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email Update on Memo Rollout
events.description: An email is sent stating that at least two different prosecution memos will be rolled out over the next few weeks.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 8, 2019, and discusses prosecution memoranda ('pros memos') related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender indicates they spoke with a team the previous day (November 7, 2019) about the timing of these memos.
The plan is to roll out at least two different prosecution memos over the next few weeks.
The document suggests ongoing legal or prosecutorial activity regarding Epstein around late 2019.
